freenet.keys
Class NodeCHK

java.lang.Object
  freenet.keys.Key
      freenet.keys.NodeCHK
All Implemented Interfaces:
WritableToDataOutputStream, Comparable<Key>
public class NodeCHK
extends Key

Author:
amphibian Node-level CHK. Does not have enough information to decode the payload. But can verify that it is intact. Just has the routingKey.

getType

public short getType()
Description copied from class: Key
Get key type
  • High 8 bit ((type >> 8) & 0xFF) is the base type (BASE_TYPE or NodeSSK.BASE_TYPE).
  • Low 8 bit (type & 0xFF) is the crypto algorithm. (Currently only Key.ALGO_AES_PCFB_256_SHA256 is supported).

Specified by:
getType in class Key

archivalCopy

public Key archivalCopy()
Description copied from class: Key
Get a copy of the key with any unnecessary information stripped, for long-term in-memory storage. E.g. for SSKs, strips the DSAPublicKey. Copies it whether or not we need to copy it because the original might pick up a pubkey after this call. And the returned key will not accidentally pick up extra data.

Specified by:
archivalCopy in class Key
